alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 11:23AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson, Madison, Lowndes and southeastern Brooks Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1123 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles east of Monticello to 6 miles north of Madison to near Suwannee River State Park. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Lake Park, Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Greenville, Lee, Twin Lakes, Hopewell, Cherry Lake, Hamburg, Pinetta, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 5, Lovett, Nankin, Empress and Clyattville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida...and south central Georgia.
